allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add graceful fallback when Manus credits are exhausted

ISSUE: Manus API returned "credit limit exceeded" error
SOLUTION: Automatically fall back to Gemini with user notification

CHANGES:
- Detect credit limit errors from Manus API
- Auto-fallback to Gemini when Manus credits exhausted
- Add clear warning message to user about fallback
- Prevents complete failure when credits run out

This ensures the system stays operational even when 
Manus credits are depleted, maintaining service availability.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
